pkgmetadata.longdescription: NeuroAnatomy Toolbox ('nat') Extension for Assessing Neuron Similarity and Clustering // Extends package 'nat' (NeuroAnatomy Toolbox) by providing a collection of NBLAST- related functions for neuronal morphology comparison (Costa et al. (2016) doi: 10.1016/j.neuron.2016.06.012).
